elements.text: You are waiting for your drink at a cafe. When you think about walking over to pick up your drink, you fear others will notice your unsteady walking. As you're walking over, your legs are noticeably unstable with each step, and you feel...

elements.name: Getting Coffee_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
